name: Space Hornet - Ultimate Battle
description:
GOTY 2016 incoming !

...well at least you can enjoy the sound of your friends exploding after a good aimshot.


Developpers

- Adrien Faure --> Art

- Bastien Chapuis --> Program

Requirements

- Xbox pad is recommanded, but you can configure axis of any PC controller and/or use your Playstation controller with MotioninJoy software

- if you can play on a big screen (like TV) it's better ;)

- at least one friend


Features

- Customize your character

- 4 Weapons & 4 Tools ! Use them in a synergetic way to explode your opponents

- Up to 4 difficulties modes for the arena

Controls

- Left Joystick --> move your character

- Right Joystick --> dash

- A or LT --> use a Weapon

- B or RT --> use a Tool

- LB --> throw your Weapon

- RT --> throw your Tool

- Select (in game) --> turn on/off HUD player

- Start (at character selection) --> delete character

- M (on keyboard) --> mute/unmute music

Work in Progress

- Menus

- other Game Mode

Even if we're taking a break, please use the comments section to give us some feedbacks :)
